player_view_npc_data.name: Marcus Doyle
player_view_npc_data.description: The lawman of Westridge Town. Burly, uniform straining at the seams, fond of drinking. He's self-appointed as the 'official investigator' of this case, speaking loudly and impatiently directing the scene, seemingly very annoyed by the chaos.
player_view_npc_data.goal: Catch the criminal, maintain town order, and assist you in the investigation.
player_view_npc_data.recent_events: Currently directing the scene, claiming to have caught Jonah red-handed. He shows a businesslike seriousness toward the Federal Inspector's (your) arrival.
player_view_npc_data.short_term_plan: Keep bystanders outside the police line and push to get the prisoner back to jail quickly.

player_view_npc_data.name: Harlan Tate
player_view_npc_data.description: A middle-aged politician who seems out of place in the crowd.
player_view_npc_data.recent_events: Rushed to the scene immediately after the explosion, but didn't direct rescue efforts, just stood aside watching anxiously.
player_view_npc_data.short_term_plan: Sitting restlessly in the saloon, trying to avoid reporters' cameras.

player_view_npc_data.name: Jonah Briggs
player_view_npc_data.description: A ragged, haggard-faced poor man. He's handcuffed in the corner, clutching an unknown small medicine bottle as if it were his lifeline.
player_view_npc_data.goal: Remains silent. He admits to blowing the door but refuses to share other details.
player_view_npc_data.recent_events: Arrested at the explosion scene. No cash from the missing vault was found on him.
player_view_npc_data.short_term_plan: Stares at the ground, submits to the sheriff's scolding, only resisting violently when you try to take his medicine bottle.

player_view_npc_data.name: Maeve Alcott
player_view_npc_data.description: A charming yet shrewd proprietress. She runs the town's only entertainment venue and seems to know every man's weakness.
carry_with: An expensive bottle of red wine
player_view_npc_data.recent_events: Claims she was hosting guests at the saloon all last night and knows the sheriff's whereabouts well.
player_view_npc_data.short_term_plan: Offers you free drinks, observing your intentions.

player_view_npc_data.name: Ramon Vega
player_view_npc_data.description: A taciturn craftsman. He looks somewhat resentful.
player_view_npc_data.goal: Wants to reclaim what belongs to him but is too intimidated by the sheriff's authority to speak up.
player_view_npc_data.recent_events: Shows professional puzzlement at the explosion damage. He gazes at the ruins, seemingly deep in thought.
player_view_npc_data.short_term_plan: Drinks in the saloon corner. If you show interest in 'tools' or 'techniques', he might be willing to chat.

social_network.marcus_doyle: Seems to hold a grudge against the sheriff

player_view_npc_data.name: Lila Hart
player_view_npc_data.description: A penny-pinching businesswoman. She's waving a bill around, angrily complaining to everyone about someone defaulting on payment.
player_view_npc_data.goal: Collect debts. She seems to have dirt on the town's bigwigs she wants to share.
player_view_npc_data.recent_events: Publicly claims someone bought enough explosives from her to blow up the whole town. Very emotional.
player_view_npc_data.short_term_plan: Seizes every opportunity to complain to you about the debtor, convinced that person is connected to the bombing.

player_view_npc_data.name: Eli Watkins
player_view_npc_data.description: An aggressive young reporter. Camera in hand, he's excited like a shark smelling blood. He seems to think this is more than a simple robbery case.
player_view_npc_data.goal: Sell you his 'exclusive truth'. He has a photo he claims captured an important clue.
carry_with: A pen with a chewed-up cap
player_view_npc_data.recent_events: Has been following the mayor, convinced this is critically connected to the case.
player_view_npc_data.short_term_plan: Keeps showing you the photo, trying to get you to focus on the mayor's movements.
